name: Prisma Wars Reloaded
description:
Prisma Wars is a 2D Tower defense I worked on for a Computer Project back in 2019. I decided to create a remake in 2021 where I sought to improve the visuals and polish things that I found to be rather dated.

I hope that you guys enjoy the work I put into this little scratch game I made.

In the download is just a text file containing the link to the game, but you can ignore it and just go to this link here https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/575009416/
